resources.string: Soundboard Quick Tile requires permission to record audio
Soundboard Quick Tile requires this permission to export this button sound to your device storage
Soundboard Quick Tile requires this permission to import a sound from your device storage
Enter a button title and click the Save button to save the quick tile, or click above to record again
On the following screen, please browse to a save location and verify your chosen filename ends with the .m4a file extension.
On the following screen, please browse and open the file to import.
Error: Imported file is too large
Enter a button title and click the Save button to finish importing the selected file
Please click and hold on the Soundboard tile to configure
